text: Nītārtha Institute is a school of advanced Buddhist studies for Western students designed based upon the traditional Tibetan monastic university curriculum.About Nitartha Institute Its teachers include the published translator Karl Brunnholzl, as well as the head of Nalandabodhi, The Dzogchen Ponlop Rinpoche. ==Notes== ==External links== * Nitartha Institute Home * Nitartha International Home Category:Buddhist organizations based in the United States Category:Buddhism in Washington (state) Category:Tibetan Buddhist organizations
